page.title: 13LEISURE,WARGRAVE & DISTRICT
page.content:
{Theatre Workshop}was founded 10 years ago.It has grown from 30 to 150 people with an age range from 5 to 80 years It is now a tradition to produce a Christmas Show,written and performed by local people. A large scale Musical Show has become a part of Wargrave Village Festival.Junior and Youth Sections are flourishing. {CLUBS} Guides,Brownies: St.Mary's Youth Club Scouts,Cubs: Wargrave Youth Club
Women's Institutes(4): Bowls Wargrave Women's Club: Tennis Wargrave Men's Club: Cricket Royal British Legion: Football Wine Circle: Badminton Ramblers Boating Runners Hockey
